comment._content: A William B. Boulton, Jr. gets lots of mentions wrt polo and society events in the New York papers over several ears. E.g., New-York tribune., July 04, 1916, Page 11, 2nd column from right chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1916-07-04/ed-...
